name: decentralized-employee-identity
description: Decentralized Employee Identity & Access Manager using SSI standards

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run wallet:dev"
scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build && npm run wallet:build
scripts.test: npm run backend:test && npm run frontend:test
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/staging.yaml --stack-name employee-identity-staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/production.yaml --stack-name employee-identity-prod
